Name: Because He lives-Omdat Hy leef F
ChorusText:
Because He lives, I can face tomorrow
Because He lives, all fear is gone
Because I know, yes I know He holds the future
And life is worth the living, just because He lives
Omdat Hy leef, sien ek kans vir more
omdat Hy leef verdwyn my vrees,
Omdat ek weet, ja ek weet Hy hou die toekoms
en die lewe is die moeite werd omdat Hy leef
